title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Unleash the power of professional-grade performance right into your hands with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This dynamic duo, model DCK240C2, is engineered to tackle a wide range of applications with ease and precision.

**Transform Your Toolbox with the DEWALT Powerhouse Combo**

The kit features two robust tools - the DCD771 Drill/Driver and the DCF885 Impact Driver - each designed with the durability and reliability you expect from DEWALT.

**DCD771 Drill/Driver: A Compact Power Performer**
- Enjoy the versatility of a dual-speed transmission offering 0-450 and 0-1500 RPM for a variety of tasks.
- A hefty 300 UWO (unit watts out) motor ensures you have the power to conquer challenging jobs.
- The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck provides a tight bit grip with ease.
- Ergonomic design makes it comfortably lightweight without compromising on performance.

**DCF885 Impact Driver: Precision in Tight Spaces**
- Measuring just 5.55 inches front to back and weighing a mere 2.8 lbs, this compact tool fits into the tightest areas.
- The one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, making bit changes a breeze.
- Illuminate your work with the built-in 3 LED light ring that provides visibility without shadows and has a 20-second delay after trigger release.

**Power Endurance and Portability**
- This combo kit comes with two 20V MAX Lithium Ion batteries, ensuring you have a spare to keep you powered through the longest projects.
- With the included charger, your tools will always be ready when you are.

**Built for Convenience**
- The integrated LED foot light on both tools offers superior visibility, allowing you to work in low-light conditions with confidence.
- The signature Yellow/Black DEWALT color scheme isn't just for looks; it denotes a commitment to quality that professionals trust.

**Comprehensive Kit Contents**
- The DEWALT DCK240C2 kit includes the DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V MAX Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger, so you're equipped to tackle jobs right out of the box.

Perfect for both the seasoned professional and the DIY enthusiast, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is the upgrade your projects deserve. Don't settle for less ‚Äì grab this DEWALT combo kit and experience the difference that power, precision, and portability can make in your work today!

**Versatile Drill/Driver:** The DCD771 Drill/Driver boasts a high-performance motor that delivers 300 UWO of power, ensuring efficient drilling and fastening. With a two-speed transmission offering 0-450 and 0-1500 RPM, you can effortlessly switch between tasks requiring high speed or high torque. The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck provides a tight bit grip, while the ergonomic handle offers comfort and control during extended use.

**Impactful Driving:** Accompanying the drill is the DCF885 Impact Driver, a lightweight powerhouse at only 2.8 lbs and 5.55 inches in length. Its one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, making bit changes a breeze. The impact driver also features a built-in LED light ring with three LEDs and a 20-second delay, ensuring visibility without shadows in dark workspaces.

**Cordless Convenience:** Say goodbye to the hassle of cords. Both tools are part of DEWALT's 20V MAX system and come with two Lithium-Ion batteries, providing long-lasting power and performance. The included charger ensures that you're always ready to go, minimizing downtime and keeping your workflow smooth.

**Durability and Design:** Clad in DEWALT's signature yellow and black, the tools are not only stylish but also compact and lightweight, making them easy to carry and use in tight spaces. The LED foot light on both tools enhances visibility and aids in precision work.

**Complete Kit:** The DCK240C2 kit includes one DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, one DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V MAX Lithium-Ion Batteries, and a charger. You'll have everything you need to conquer a wide range of applications, from construction to home repair.

Meanwhile, the DCF885 Impact Driver's compact design (5.55 inches front to back) and light 2.8 lbs weight deliver powerful performance where it counts.

- **Ergonomic Design:** Both tools feature a comfortable, ergonomic handle that provides optimal balance and tool control, ensuring you can work longer with less fatigue.

- **Ratcheting Chucks:** The Drill/Driver comes with a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for superior bit gripping strength. The Impact Driver features a 1/4-inch hex chuck with one-handed loading for quick bit changes, accepting 1-inch bit tips.

- **Enhanced Visibility:** Navigate your workspaces with ease. Three LED lights with a 20-second delay after trigger release on the Impact Driver, coupled with the LED foot light on both tools, provide superior visibility without shadows.

- **Portability and Convenience:** With no cords to tie you down, this kit offers freedom of movement across any job site. Two 20V MAX Lithium Ion batteries ensure you always have power on hand, and the included charger keeps downtime to a minimum.

- 1x Charger

**Unleash Robust Power**
The DEWALT DCD771 Drill/Driver features a high-performance motor that delivers 300 UWO of power output, ensuring that you can tackle even the most demanding tasks with ease. With its two-speed transmission ranging from 0 to 450 and up to 1500 RPM, precision and control are at your fingertips for a variety of drilling and fastening applications.

Both the DCD771 Drill/Driver and the DCF885 Impact Driver boast a compact and lightweight design, allowing you to work in tight spaces without fatigue. The ergonomic handles provide comfort and control, making prolonged use a breeze.

**Rapid Chuck and Bit Changes**
The Drill/Driver comes with a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for quick and secure bit changes, while the Impact Driver features a 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips, streamlining your workflow and increasing productivity.

**Impactful Performance**
The DCF885 Impact Driver's compact size, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back and weighing a mere 2.8 lbs, allows for comfortable use and access to tight areas. Despite its size, it packs a punch with its ability to handle large fasteners with ease.
